inquiry_text: I've been waiting for my refund for over 2 weeks now. When will I receive it?
Your product is amazing! Just wanted to say thank you for the great customer service.
I ordered the wrong size. How do I exchange it for a different one?
The item I received is damaged. I want a replacement immediately.
I can't log into my account. I've tried resetting my password multiple times.
Where can I find information about your return policy?
I've been on hold for 30 minutes! This is unacceptable service.
My subscription was supposed to end last month but I was charged again.
Do you offer discounts for bulk orders?
The instructions in the manual don't match the product I received.
I love your company's commitment to sustainability. Keep up the good work!
My delivery was supposed to arrive yesterday but it's still not here.
Can I change my shipping address after placing an order?
The color of the item I received doesn't match what was shown on the website.
I've been a loyal customer for years and would like to know about any loyalty programs.
Your website is constantly crashing when I try to checkout.
I was charged twice for my order. Please refund one of the charges.
How do I track my order? I can't find the tracking information in my email.
The customer service representative I spoke with yesterday was very rude.
I'd like to cancel my order before it ships. Is that possible?
